1.content: Get Supabase credentials for backend services
1.details: Request user's Supabase project credentials to set up the backend infrastructure including database, authentication, and file storage.

2.content: Build the comprehensive full-stack AI Agent Chat Application
2.details:
Develop both Admin Panel and User-Facing App with all specified features:
- Admin Panel: User management, client customization (logo/brand color), AI agent marketplace, conversation monitoring
- User-Facing App: Login system, agent gallery, chat interface, conversation history
- Database schema for users, agents, conversations, settings
- Authentication system
- File upload functionality for logos and agent images
- Real-time chat functionality
- Professional UI/UX using specified color palette
